programme.title: True Crime Story
programme.desc: S01E31 Citizen Detective: The Mays Family A young mother is found unresponsive in bed, and her cause of death is determined to be an accidental heroin overdose; but her family questions everything about the circumstances around her death, so they launch their own investigation.

programme.title: True Crime Story
programme.desc: S01E32 Citizen Detective: Rebekah Heath A mystery that plagued law enforcement for over twenty years: four unidentified bodies found inside barrels in the woods; one woman searching for answers from her own troubled past sets herself on a journey to give the victims back their names.

programme.title: True Crime Story
programme.desc: S01E33 Citizen Detective: Deb & Judy A young man leaves home for the corner store, but dies on a rainy sidewalk just down the street; bystanders claim that he fell off of his bike, but his mom and sister don't buy it. They hit the streets to find answers.

programme.title: True Crime Story
programme.desc: S01E34 Citizen Detective: John Allore When a college student was found dead in rural Quebec, police refused to call it a murder; but years later, her brother continues his own investigation into her death; on the eve of a trip to return to the scene of the crime, tragedy strikes again.

programme.title: True Crime Story
programme.desc: S01E35 Citizen Detective: Lisa Coppel A young girl's life was thrown into chaos when her single mother died by a gunshot wound in their remote mountain home; the journey for the truth would be long and arduous, and it would be thirty years until justice was finally served.

programme.title: True Crime Story
programme.desc: S01E36 Citizen Detective: Josh Hallmark A young man whose childhood was marked by tragedy learns of a relatively unknown serial killer, and finds himself thinking about unidentified victims; it isn't long before that pursuit becomes a full-time job... and identifying victims an obsession.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: S02E06 Jake and Sophia Jake discovers the woman he hit it off with at the bar is the lawyer representing a perp he's trying to put in jail; Gina and Charles try to leave their relationship in the past.

programme.title: Parks and Recreation
programme.desc: S01E04 Boys' Club Leslie faces a tough ethical choice at a casual get-together; Andy has a surprise for Ann.

programme.title: Parks and Recreation
programme.desc: S01E05 The Banquet Leslie makes an impression at a banquet honoring her mother; Mark and Tom go to a bar to pick up women.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: S06E07 Hey, Baby, What's Wrong, Part 2 Criss (James Marsden) and Liz need a dining room table for their Valentine's Day celebration; Jack spends time with his mother-in-law (Mary Steenburgen); Frank and Tracy try to find a date for Lutz.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: S06E08 The Tuxedo Begins After Jack is mugged, he decides to run for mayor so he can protect the city's elite; Liz puts herself ahead of the good of the city; Jenna and Paul try acting like an average couple.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: S09E03 Catch of the Day Phil believes he'll have a day of bad luck after failing to successfully complete his daily superstition; Mitch is certain that Cam is undermining him during their kitchen renovation; Jay is determined to get Gloria to admit she was in an accident.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: S09E04 Sex, Lies, and Kickball Jay's friend Shorty visits from Costa Rica but spends more time with Gloria than Jay; Alex decides to prove to Claire that her relationship with Ben is a sexual one.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: S09E05 It's the Great Pumpkin, Phil Dunphy Phil and Claire start to question their enthusiasm for Halloween when no one else seems to feel the same; Mitch confronts Jay about how long the kitchen remodel is taking; Cam oversteps his boundaries as a house guest.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: S09E06 Ten Years Later Claire throws a 10th anniversary party for Jay and Gloria; Phil plans a magic trick in which Gloria appears out of thin air in her wedding dress.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: S09E07 Winner Winner Turkey Dinner Jay gives a Thanksgiving toast that honors the family's successes, although everyone knows it isn't quite true; everyone tries to hide things about their perceived triumphs; Phil works hard to master a magic trick to prove he's not a failure.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: S09E08 Brushes With Celebrity The family recount all their biggest celebrity encounters; Phil shows a house to his musical hero; Jay's day at jury duty takes an unexpected turn; Manny's encounter with his favorite playwright doesn't go as expected.

programme.title: Chicago Med
programme.desc: S10E17 The Book of Archer Charles and Archer treat a heart transplant patient who believes his new heart doesn't want to be in his body; Lenox takes a personal day; Asher discovers a mass on a pregnant woman's ovary.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: S13E17 A Beast Like This Kidd connects with a troubled teen interested in Girls on Fire; Cruz, Capp and Tony eagerly wait to try out Squad's new saw; Violet and Novak are stumped by a bodybuilder who passed out at the gym.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.

programme.desc: Texas State (6-8) visits the Cajundome to face a struggling Louisiana (1-14) squad. The Bobcats rely on standout Saniya Burks (15.2 PPG), while the Ragin' Cajuns look to freshman Amijah Price (13.6 PPG) to snap a three-game home slide.

programme.title: Women's College Basketball : Duke at Stanford ᴸᶦᵛᵉ
programme.desc: After a rocky 3-6 start, Duke seeks its 8th straight win when it visits Stanford in an ACC test. A win would also up the Blue Devils' league record to 6-0. The Cardinal are 14-3 overall and 3-1 in ACC play.

S02E03 Help Is Not Coming The first responders continue to deal with the fallout of a massive earthquake; Athena tries to keep the peace as Bobby and team continue to rescue victims from a collapsing high-rise hotel; Maddie must help a pregnant couple deliver their baby.

S02E06 Dosed The first responders unwittingly become the subject of an eager reporter's first on-air assignment; Athena prepares for May's homecoming dance; the team responds to emergencies at an eating contest, a bodybuilding competition and a toddler pageant.

S02E07 Haunted Halloween finds the first responders racing to the rescue at a cemetery, a haunted hayride and a spooky parade; Maddie thinks she has received a "ghost" call from a missing hiker; Hen is in a life-or-death situation with her father.

S02E08 Buck, Actually Buck jumps back into the dating scene but fears he will return to his old ways; a woman goes to great extremes on a freeway overpass to get the attention of her husband; a couple have a car accident on their wedding day.
S02E09 Hen Begins Hen relives her evolution into the firefighter she is today as she recalls the first times she met Chimney and Athena.

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: Movie (2016) Deadshot, Harley Quinn, Captain Boomerang, Killer Croc and other armed supervillains unite to battle a mysterious and powerful entity, while the diabolical Joker launches an evil agenda of his own.

programme.title: Joker
programme.desc: Movie (2019) Isolated, bullied and disregarded by society, failed comedian Arthur Fleck begins a slow descent into madness as he transforms into the criminal mastermind known as the Joker.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: S10E14 Eric Andre Returns The Jokers ask random park goers to watch their grandma while they make a quick errand, then a fake documentary interviews them; the losing Joker gets dressed as a clown and punished by the other Jokers and returning special guest, Eric Andre.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: S10E17 Harvey Guillen The Jokers pose as lawyers with ridiculous contracts and mean no disrespect yet say disrespectful things to shoppers; the losing Joker is coached by Harvey Guillen on his latest acting method.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: S06E05 The One With Joey's Porsche Rachel wants Ross to admit that he's mentally unbalanced so that a judge will grant them an annulment.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: S06E06 The One on the Last Night While Monica helps Rachel move out, the two women have a war of words; Chandler says a "financial" adios to Joey.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: S06E07 The One Where Phoebe Runs Rachel regrets asking Phoebe to jog with her when her uncoordinated movements attract unwanted attention.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: S06E08 The One With Ross' Teeth After bleaching his teeth, Ross discovers they glow in the dark; Joey's new roommate wants to redecorate.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: S06E09 The One Where Ross Got High Chandler finds out Monica never told her parents he was living with her; Rachel tries her hand at making dessert.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: S06E10 The One With the Routine Janine invites Joey, Monica and Ross to a TV taping; Phoebe and Rachel want an early glimpse at their Christmas gifts.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: S06E11 The One With the Apothecary Table Janine's attitude causes strife between Joey and his friends; Rachel gets an apothecary table from a flea market.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: S06E12 The One With the Joke Ross and Chandler argue over authorship of a joke; a question from Monica puts Phoebe on the spot; Joey reluctantly takes a job at Central Perk.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: S06E13 The One With Rachel's Sister Rachel is worried about her sister's flirtation with Ross; sickly Monica is well enough to seduce Chandler; Joey uses free food to lure women to date him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: S06E14 The One Where Chandler Can't Cry Rachel and her sister get into a heated sibling rivalry over Ross; Chandler confesses he hasn't cried since he was a child.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: S06E15 The One That Could Have Been When Rachel tells her friends about Barry and Mindy's impending divorce, the others speculate how their lives could have turned out if they had chosen different paths.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: S06E16 The One That Could Have Been Carol and Ross decide to spice up their marriage; Rachel goes to Joey's and kisses him; Rachel catches Barry cheating.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: S06E17 The One With the Unagi Chandler's anniversary gift to Monica is really one an ex-girlfriend gave him; Joey hires a look-alike; Ross tries to teach martial arts to Rachel.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: S06E18 The One Where Ross Dates a Student Ross toys with dating one of his students; a curling iron starts a fire in Phoebe and Rachel's apartment.

programme.title: The Suicide Squad
programme.desc: Movie (2021) The government sends the most dangerous supervillains in the world to the remote, enemy-infused island of Corto Maltese. Armed with high-tech weapons, they trek through the dangerous jungle on a search-and-destroy mission with Col. Rick Flag.

programme.title: Wonder Woman 1984
programme.desc: Movie (2020) Wonder Woman musters all of her strength, wisdom and courage as she finds herself squaring off against Maxwell Lord and the Cheetah, a villainess who possesses superhuman strength and agility.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: S07E19 The Indecision Amalgamation Raj struggles with guilt when he dates two women at once; Penny has a chance to play a part in a cheesy movie; Sheldon is torn between two gaming systems.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: S07E20 The Relationship Diremption Sheldon has a personal crisis when he decides string theory is a waste of his time; a double date ends in embarrassment for Howard.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: S07E21 The Anything Can Happen Recurrence Sheldon gives spontaneity a try, which causes unexpected friction for Penny, Bernadette and Amy; Raj asks Howard for help with preparation for a date with Emily.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: S07E22 The Proton Transmogrification Professor Proton (Bob Newhart) helps Sheldon deal with grief; Leonard gets into a competition with Penny; Bernadette and Amy prepare a "Star Wars Day" gift for the guys.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: S07E23 The Gorilla Dissolution A bad day compels Penny to re-evaluate her choices -- including Leonard; Bernadette and Howard must care for Mrs. Wolowitz; Sheldon gives Raj advice on relationships.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: S07E24 The Status Quo Combustion Faced with an uncertain future, Sheldon considers a major change; Emily and Raj decide to take things to the next level.

programme.title: The Suicide Squad
programme.desc: Movie (2021) The government sends the most dangerous supervillains in the world to the remote, enemy-infused island of Corto Maltese. Armed with high-tech weapons, they trek through the dangerous jungle on a search-and-destroy mission with Col. Rick Flag.

programme.title: Blue Beetle
programme.desc: Movie (2023) Jaime Reyes finds himself in possession of an ancient relic of alien biotechnology called the Scarab. When the Scarab chooses Jaime to be its symbiotic host, he's bestowed with a suit of armor that's capable of extraordinary and unpredictable powers.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: S01E15 My Funky Valentine Claire and Phil plan a Valentine's Day excursion; Jay takes Gloria to a comedy show; Cameron and Mitchell try to play cupid for Manny.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: S01E16 Fears Phil tries to conquer his fear of the dark when he and Luke go on a discovery expedition underneath the house; Mitchell and Cameron invite Lily's pediatrician over for brunch.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: S01E17 Truth Be Told Phil invites his high school girlfriend (Judy Greer) to the house; Jay accidentally kills Manny's pet turtle, then goes to extremes to cover his tracks; overworked Mitchell stands up to his boss.

programme.title: Family Matters
programme.desc: S01E07 Body Damage Rachel and Harriette wreck Carl's vintage patrol car and must fix the car before Carl notices.

programme.title: Family Matters
programme.desc: S01E09 Stake-Out Harriette gets jealous when Carl goes on a lengthy stakeout with a policewoman.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: S02E22 A Swedish Science Thing and the Equation for Toast Sheldon invites the entire school to a party for the Nobel Prize announcements; Meemaw learns more about Dr. Sturgis' past; Georgie's desire for cable TV leads to a standoff between him and George Sr.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: S03E01 Quirky Eggheads and Texas Snow Globes After Dr. Sturgis experiences a nervous breakdown, Mary worries Sheldon is headed down a similar path; Georgie discovers he has a knack for sales.

programme.desc: S03E06 Go Bullfrogs! Phil takes Haley to visit his alma mater; Claire goes out with Mitchell and Cameron; Gloria and Jay may have to broach a delicate subject with Manny.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: S03E18 A Couple Bruised Ribs and a Cereal Box Ghost Detector When George Sr. accidentally lands the school librarian in the hospital, the Cooper family must nurse her back to health; Meemaw gives Georgie relationship advice.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: S03E19 A House for Sale and Serious Woman Stuff When Sheldon learns the house next door is for sale, he takes it upon himself to find the perfect neighbors; Missy is torn when she's forced to pitch against her boyfriend at a baseball game.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: S03E20 A Baby Tooth and the Egyptian God of Knowledge Sheldon has a scientific breakthrough at the dentist's office; Dale and Meemaw go to the casino; Georgie makes a big mistake when Dale leaves him in charge of the store.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: S03E21 A Secret Letter and a Lowly Disc of Processed Meat Sheldon discovers that Mary's been keeping a secret about him; Meemaw is furious when she learns Dale fired Georgie.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: S04E01 Graduation After graduating high school, Sheldon has a breakdown when he realizes he may not be ready for college; Dale tries to make amends with Meemaw.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: S04E02 A Docent, A Little Lady and a Bouncer Named Dalton Sheldon gets a summer job at the local train museum; Missy embarks on a new stage of womanhood; Georgie discovers Mary's guilty pleasure.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: S08E06 The One With the Halloween Party At Monica's Halloween party, Phoebe meets her twin sister's fiance and finds that she is attracted to him.

programme.title: Friends

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: S08E08 The One With the Stripper Chandler finds out that Monica had a bachelorette party, even though they promised not to have parties; Rachel takes Phoebe along to dinner with Rachel's dad, because she is afraid he will be angry when she tells him she's pregnant.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: S08E09 The One With the Rumor Monica encounters a high-school friend (guest star Brad Pitt) and invites him to Thanksgiving Day dinner.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: S08E10 The One With Monica's Boots Chandler is aghast when Monica buys expensive boots; Phoebe discovers that Ross' son attends school with Sting's son.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: S08E11 The One With Ross' Step Forward Ross' new girlfriend wants to put their photograph on Christmas cards; Rachel eyes Joey as a possible partner.

programme.desc: S07E16 One Fall The team reopens the case of a dock worker who moonlighted as a professional wrestler until he was fatally shot in 1986; Valens secretly looks into a lead on the man who mugged and raped his mother.

programme.desc: S04E11 Trial by Magic A premonition shows Phoebe that the defendant in a murder trial is innocent despite the wealth of evidence against him.

programme.desc: S04E13 Charmed and Dangerous The lives of Leo and Cole hang in the balance as the Source siphons away all magical powers, both good and evil, after he learns he is doomed to be vanquished by the Charmed Ones.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: S04E14 The Three Faces of Phoebe Phoebe conjures a younger version and an older version of herself to help her decide whether or not she should marry Cole.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: S02E04 The House Human bones are found at the site of a now shuttered prison, the scene of melee and murder 36 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: S02E07 It's Raining Men A long-term AIDS survivor asks Rush and Valens to reopen the case involving his murdered partner, an AIDS activist and scorned member of a prominent family.

programme.desc: S16 E8 Caught in a Jam An investigation is opened after a commuter turboprop crashed on a hill in New Zealand.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: S5 E2 Speed Trap A 1971 midair collision between a Hughes Airwest flight and an F-4 Phantom fighter jet is recalled.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: S9 E4 Fatal Focus What caused Garuda Flight 200 to slam to the ground and careen off the runway in Yogyakarta, Indonesia? Was it a powerful downdraft? Was there something wrong with the wing flaps? Or did a baffling decision by the pilot lead to the death of 21 people? Join us as we investigate the crash of March 7, 2007, through actual video captured at the scene and testimony from a heroic passenger who survived the disaster.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: S14 E10 Fire On Board When a fire breaks out on a plane, an emergency situation can escalate to a deadly disaster in seconds.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: S3 E7 Under Pressure A 1991 incident involving Nigeria Airways Flight 2120 is recalled. Minutes after taking off from King Abdulaziz International Airport near Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, all went wrong on the DC-8: the hydraulics system failed and a fire in the wheel well threatened to turn the plane into a fireball.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: S9 E8 Steep Impact A dangerous test flight may be the only way to uncover the truth about what brought down a twin-turboprop aircraft in Georgia.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: Dead of Night Confused, blind, and lost in the dark, three crews lose sight of the horizon and fall into the same terrible trap.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: S14 E8 Controversial Crashes A profile of three of the most controversial aviation disasters in history is presented. The incident is more popularly known as the "Munich Air Disaster".

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: S18 E4 Dead Tired Follow the tragic crash of Continental Connection Flight 3407 from Newark, NJ, into a house in Buffalo, NY, a case that confounded both forensic anthropology students and investigators.

programme.title: Mighty Cruise Ships
programme.desc: S3 E6 Marina The crew of the Marina, Oceania Cruises' largest ship, makes a 12-day, five port voyage.

programme.title: Mighty Cruise Ships
programme.desc: S3 E3 Regal Princess Regal Princess is the largest ship Princess Cruises has ever built; sailing the Baltic Sea, the crew faces narrow channels, shifting waters, shallow harbours, and buses and trains that transport guests but play havoc with the ship's schedule.

programme.desc: S2 E4 Europa 2 Spotlighting Europa 2, a spacious ship.

programme.title: Mighty Cruise Ships
programme.desc: S1 E5 Stella Australis A luxury expedition ship searches for elusive wildlife.

programme.desc: S2 E5 Ocean Endeavour The Ocean Endeavour is a vessel with an ice-strengthened hull and a fleet of zodiacs; and the staff are experts in Arctic ice, wildlife and natural history.

programme.title: Mighty Cruise Ships
programme.desc: S4 E8 Sky Princess Sky Princess is loaded with big tech to get the job done, whether it's sailing into tight ports; battling strong winds and currents; feeding more than 3500 guests; or helping passengers locate their friends on the ship.

programme.title: Mighty Trains
programme.desc: S3 E5 Bergen Railway & Nordland Line Norway's Bergen Line stretches nearly 500 kilometers from Oslo to Bergen, passing through 182 tunnels; Nordland Line transports passengers and freight; Flam Railway boasts one of the steepest railway climbs on Earth.

programme.title: Mighty Trains
programme.desc: S4 E5 Reunification Express Beautiful sights in Vietnam are shown while traveling on the Reunification Express. The 3-day journey covers 1,072 miles of railway that passes through more than twenty Vietnamese provinces between Hanoi, the northern capital and Ho Chi Minh City, the southern capital.

programme.title: Mighty Trains
programme.desc: S2 E4 Ave 103 Spain is traveled to on Europe's biggest high-speed rail network. Areas are visited under construction between Barcelona and Madrid to expand the infrastructure. The new high-speed train set to hit the tracks in the coming year is featured.

programme.title: Mighty Ships
programme.desc: S5 E1 Norwegian Epic Spotlighting the Norwegian cruise ship Epic.

programme.title: Mighty Ships
programme.desc: S5 E3 Le Boreal Spotlighting Le Boreal, a cruise ship built to survive severe weather conditions, including towering waves.

programme.desc: S10 E4 MSC Meraviglia MSC's biggest cruise ship navigates tight Mediterranean harbors, offering a water park, classic excursions and Cirque du Soleil at sea.

programme.title: Mighty Cruise Ships
programme.desc: S2 E1 Carnival Vista In the Season 2 premiere, Carnival Vista carries more than 4,600 passengers and boasts 10 restaurants, nearly 2,000 staterooms and a crew of 1,400 ready to tend to guests' every need.

programme.title: Mighty Cruise Ships
programme.desc: S3 E5 Symphony of the Seas A crew of 2,200 on the Symphony of the Seas tends to more than 5,500 passengers as they sail to ports in Spain, France and Italy.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: S2 E3 P-3 Orion The WP-3D Orion aircraft is featured.

programme.title: Mighty Trains
programme.desc: S2 E3 Maharaja's Express Maharaja's Express is a luxury train and often referred to as Indian Railways' crown jewel. Passengers pay between $2,900 to $26,000 USD per ticket for the privilege of being treated like royalty.

programme.title: Mighty Cruise Ships
programme.desc: S4 E6 Norwegian Joy The Norwegian Joy is tailor-made to sail through the daunting waters of Alaska. This 700,000,000 vessel aims to give its passengers an unforgettable experience.

programme.title: Mighty Cruise Ships
programme.desc: S1 E1 Paul Gauguin In the series premiere, Paul Gauguin navigates delicate waters and offers five-star luxury while sailing the coral reefs, mountainous islands, and tropical playgrounds of French Polynesia.

programme.title: Mighty Trains
programme.desc: S4 E4 Belgrade to Bar Railway A trip to the capital of Serbia and Montenegro beaches in Belgrade to Bar train.

programme.desc: S1 E2 Le Soléal A luxury expedition ship sails through uncharted waters in Indonesia.

programme.title: Mighty Cruise Ships
programme.desc: S2 E2 Royal Clipper Royal Clipper is the largest sailing-cruise ship in the world, with five masts soaring 58 meters high, supporting 42 sails that carry the ship to a speed of 17 knots.

programme.title: Mighty Cruise Ships
programme.desc: S3 E4 Viking Star The world's biggest river-cruising company makes a big splash in the ocean-cruising industry. Visiting southern Spain, Normandy and the canals of Amsterdam, the crew navigates narrow passages and battles rough seas.

programme.title: Mighty Cruise Ships
programme.desc: S2 E3 Viking Sea Viking Sea, an ocean-going vessel that features fine food and Scandinavian décor, is spotlighted.

programme.title: How Did They Build That
programme.desc: S1 E6 Arches & Opera Houses Take a trip to Rotterdam, Guangzhou, and London and witness astounding feats of design and engineering.

programme.title: How Did They Build That
programme.desc: S4 E8 Facelifts & Scaffolds A new museum building bends 1,100-glass tubes to form a facade and tunnels below the water table. A vast 11-storey glass atrium HQ is built on the former Berlin Wall site to represent unity. And NJ's Bayonne Bridge gets a faceli (Series R.Y.-2021).

programme.title: How Did They Build That
programme.desc: S3 E10 Boxes & Birds The American Museum of Natural History in NYC gets a mind blowing cave-like extension. An arts center inspired by migrating birds is built on a lake in China. Boston University gains a fossil-free, Jenga-like tower.

programme.title: How Did They Build That
programme.desc: S3 E5 Heights & Balance A 1.2 million square foot office building balances precariously on a 39 foot wide base in Chicago. A building named Pterodactyl lands on top of a Los Angeles parking garage. And the world's longest suspension footbridge is const.

programme.title: How Did They Build That
programme.desc: S4 E9 Super Stadiums & Extraordinary Elevators A 70,000-seat stadium defies seismic forces and international flight paths in LA. Zaha Hadid's dramatically twisted 33-story tower rises around ancient vaults in Malta. And Germany's elegant 807ft TK Elevator Test Tower corkscre.

programme.title: How Did They Build That
programme.desc: S3 E1 Fantastic & Futuristic A sculptural new transportation hub for New York's World Trade Center is beset by challenges. Then, Amsterdam gains a striking building inspired by a mountain valley, and a new launchpad for space travel prepares for liftoff.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That
programme.desc: S4 E8 For-Everglades Mike works with the Army Corps of Engineers on a massive project to restore essential flow of fresh water to the Florida Everglades. He also joins scientists, python hunters and the Miccosuke Tribe to eliminate invasive species.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That
programme.desc: S3 E3 Cirque Du Soleil: High-Flying Fixes Go behind the scenes at Cirque Du Soleil in Las Vegas to see talented teams fix hydraulics, the Wheel of Death, and rigging on stage shows.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That
programme.desc: S2 E3 Aquarius Reef Base The worldwide pandemic ceased operations on the world's only underwater habitat. Mike Davidson joins a crack repair crew as they dive in to bring it back to life and get NASA astronauts back inside for training.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That
programme.desc: S3 E1 US Coast Guard: Safeguarding The Seas Mike assists in repairingvessels thatthe United States Coast Guard uses to keep our oceans safe, replacing key parts of ship engines, removing a large crane from a buoy tender, and repairing a helicopter for a critical exercise.

programme.title: How Did They Build That
programme.desc: S3 E8 Subways & Sightlines A sculptural high-rise with rippling balconies breaks the mold in Chicago. Mammoth machines bore 26 miles of tunnels for an underground railroad beneath London's city streets. And Tokyo's tallest tower requires extreme earthquak.

programme.title: How Did They Build That
programme.desc: S2 E9 Mirrors & Marble Amazing buildings, bridges, lifts, and other structures that pushed structural concrete engineering to the edge.

programme.title: How Did They Build That
programme.desc: S2 E3 Retrofits & Airport Glitz Experts explain the engineering behind the creation of architect Norman Foster's Hearst Tower in NYC, Jewel Changi airport in Singapore, and architect Yann Weymouth's Dali Museum in Florida.

programme.title: How Did They Build That
programme.desc: S4 E6 Shipyards & Slender Builds A 284ft wooden skyscraper built from 1,200 bespoke pieces tests fire safety limits in Milwaukee. A decaying Amsterdam crane track transforms into elegant glass offices. And a needle-thin tower stacks 28 apartments onto a 21ft-wi (Series R.Y.-2021).

programme.title: How Did They Build That
programme.desc: S4 E2 Medals & Marinas Witness amazing buildings, bridges, lifts, and other structures that pushed structural concrete engineering to the edge.

programme.desc: Splash Down A look at three last-ditch maneuversin which open wateris the only available runway.

programme.desc: Cockpit Breakdown With communication mix-ups and personality clashes in the cockpit, three flights end in tragedy leaving investigators to unravel what went wrong.

programme.desc: S8 E3 Vanishing Act After a terrifying crash, survivors face a new challenge: surviving the remote Brazilian jungle.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: VIP on Board Airplane crashes involving high-profile passengers put added pressure on investigators.

programme.title: Air Disasters

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: Lockerbie Disaster History's most terrifying air disasters, and the investigations that followed, are revisited and reexamined.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: S19 E21 Training Ignored Kobe Bryant dies when a high-tech helicopter crashes on a routine L.A. route?training ignored with deadly results. In Missouri, cockpit chatter dooms Corporate 5966, and in Lexington, a twin-engine jet crashes after taking off f.

programme.title: Air Disasters
programme.desc: S19 E3 Pressure Point Looking back to when Japan Airlines 123 becomes the deadliest accident in history that threatened 747s around the world.

programme.title: Combat Ships
programme.desc: S1 E17 Destroyers and Cruisers The ships that made mighty empires, from the lone wolves that patrolled the high seas for imperial Britain to the USS Laffey's heroic WWII battle against kamikazes at Okinawa.

programme.title: Combat Ships
programme.desc: S1 E7 Rescue Ships A look at some of the rescue ships of the past 200 years of wartime and the brave men and women who risked their lives to save others.

programme.title: Combat Ships
programme.desc: S3 E1 Game Changers A look at the game-changers of maritime combat-revolutionary ships and the groundbreaking designers behind them.

programme.title: Combat Ships
programme.desc: S4 E5 Mutiny Anti-war sentiment and racial unrest during the Vietnam War spark rebellions at sea, mutineers overthrow Captain Bligh on the HMS Bounty, and a U.S. slave ship revolt ends in triumph.

programme.title: Combat Ships
programme.desc: S1 E15 Stealth Vessels that operate in secret, unseen by their enemies are featured from secret missions that helped win World War II, to modern stealth ships using strange shapes and technology to avoid spying ears and eyes.

programme.title: Combat Ships
programme.desc: S4 E6 Smugglers And Pirates The Navy captures an armed group of Somali pirates, a Coast Guard crew raids a drug-smuggling submarine, and Norwegian civilians in fishing boats outwit the Germans during World War II.

programme.title: Combat Ships
programme.desc: S1 E12 D-Day A retelling of the D-Day invasion and its critical naval operation involving an armada of diverse and ingenious vessels.

programme.title: Combat Ships
programme.desc: S4 E4 Heroes of Guadalcanal American troops' determination to secure a vital airfield and preserve communications lines with Australia leads to a chaotic and deadly night battle in the Pacific theater of World War II.

programme.title: Combat Ships
programme.desc: S2 E2 Amphibious Assaults Amphibious vessels: specialized landing craft built to go where no other combat ship can reach and able to deliver tanks, jeeps, soldiers, and supplies to the front lines. We detail some of the greatest ships in the history of amphibious warfare, from the LCT, which dropped the huge Allied fighting force onto the beaches of Normandy in 1944, to the Swift boats that patrolled Vietnam's shores. We also chart the evolution of combat hovercraft.

programme.title: Combat Ships
programme.desc: S1 E1 Warships of the World Wars A look at how the role of battleships changed over the course of the First and Second World Wars.

programme.title: Mighty Cruise Ships

programme.title: Mighty Cruise Ships
programme.desc: S2 E3 Viking Sea Viking Sea, an ocean-going vessel that features fine food and Scandinavian décor, is spotlighted.

programme.title: How Did They Build That

programme.title: How Did They Build That

programme.title: How Did They Build That
programme.desc: S3 E5 Heights & Balance A 1.2 million square foot office building balances precariously on a 39 foot wide base in Chicago. A building named Pterodactyl lands on top of a Los Angeles parking garage. And the world's longest suspension footbridge is const.

programme.title: How Did They Build That
programme.desc: S4 E9 Super Stadiums & Extraordinary Elevators A 70,000-seat stadium defies seismic forces and international flight paths in LA. Zaha Hadid's dramatically twisted 33-story tower rises around ancient vaults in Malta. And Germany's elegant 807ft TK Elevator Test Tower corkscre.

programme.title: How Did They Build That
programme.desc: S3 E1 Fantastic & Futuristic A sculptural new transportation hub for New York's World Trade Center is beset by challenges. Then, Amsterdam gains a striking building inspired by a mountain valley, and a new launchpad for space travel prepares for liftoff.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That
programme.desc: S4 E8 For-Everglades Mike works with the Army Corps of Engineers on a massive project to restore essential flow of fresh water to the Florida Everglades. He also joins scientists, python hunters and the Miccosuke Tribe to eliminate invasive species.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That

programme.title: How Did They Fix That
programme.desc: S2 E3 Aquarius Reef Base The worldwide pandemic ceased operations on the world's only underwater habitat. Mike Davidson joins a crack repair crew as they dive in to bring it back to life and get NASA astronauts back inside for training.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That

programme.title: How Did They Build That

programme.title: Air Disasters

programme.title: Violent Night
programme.desc: Movie (2022) An elite team of mercenaries breaks into a family compound on Christmas Eve, taking everyone hostage inside. However, they aren't prepared for a surprise combatant: Santa Claus is on the grounds, and he's about to show why this Nick is no saint.

programme.title: The Road Warrior
programme.desc: Movie (1981) Loner lawman Mad Max (Mel Gibson) fights barbarian bikers for gasoline in the wasteland of the future.

programme.title: Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome
programme.desc: Movie (1985) In the third of the "Mad Max" movies, Max (Mel Gibson) drifts into an evil town ruled by Turner. There he becomes a gladiator and gets dumped in the desert where he is rescued by a band of feral orphans who have been looking for help for years. When several of them take his appearance as a sign and go off into the desert, he follows them back to the town.

programme.title: Retribution
programme.desc: Movie (2023) While driving with his two kids, a man receives a phone call from an unknown assailant who claims there is a bomb in the car. Unable to exit the vehicle, he must now follow a series of twisted instructions while trying to figure out how to survive.

programme.title: Blackwater Lane
programme.desc: Movie (2024) Late one night a woman drives by a stranded motorist who is later revealed to have been murdered. After a series of terrifying events the woman believes she is the killer's next victim.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: S03E09 Death's Head Revisited At the Dachau concentration camp, a former Nazi is tried by a phantom jury of his tortured victims.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: S03E10 The Midnight Sun The Earth falls out of its orbit and starts moving toward the sun.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: S03E25 The Fugitive Old Ben has the strange power to change himself into anything, or anyone, he wants.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: S03E32 The Gift A man named Williams accidentally crashes his aircraft near a small Mexican village.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: S03E28 The Little People A space traveler terrorizes the tiny inhabitants of a space station into accepting him as their God, but when another space ship arrives the tyrannical man discovers everything is relative.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: S03E29 Four O'Clock An obsessed Oliver Crangle (Theodore Bikel) tells an FBI agent that a drastic transformation will take place on all the evil people in the world.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: S03E30 Hocus Pocus & Frisby Mr. Frisby impresses quite a few people with his vivid imagination.

programme.title: Freaky
programme.desc: Movie (2020) When a serial killer's mystical dagger causes him to magically switch bodies with a 17-year-old girl, the frightened teen learns she has just 24 hours to get her identity back before she looks like a middle-aged maniac forever.

programme.title: The Black Phone
programme.desc: Movie (2021) Finney is a 13-year-old boy who's being held captive in a soundproof basement by a sadistic, masked killer. When a disconnected phone on the wall starts to ring, he soon discovers that he can hear the voices of the murderer's previous victims.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: Movie (2020) After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorize his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.title: Freaky
programme.desc: Movie (2020) When a serial killer's mystical dagger causes him to magically switch bodies with a 17-year-old girl, the frightened teen learns she has just 24 hours to get her identity back before she looks like a middle-aged maniac forever.

programme.title: Retribution
programme.desc: Movie (2023) While driving with his two kids, a man receives a phone call from an unknown assailant who claims there is a bomb in the car. Unable to exit the vehicle, he must now follow a series of twisted instructions while trying to figure out how to survive.

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: Movie (2015) When the San Andreas fault triggers a magnitude 9 earthquake, a search-and-rescue helicopter pilot (Dwayne Johnson) must navigate the destruction from Los Angeles to San Francisco to bring his estranged wife (Carla Gugino) and daughter to safety.

programme.title: Real Steel
programme.desc: Movie (2011) A small-time boxing promoter and his estranged son reluctantly join together to build and train a robot fighter of championship caliber.

programme.title: Horizon Line
programme.desc: Movie (2020) A former couple board a single-engine plane for a routine and casual flight to their friend's tropical island wedding. But within minutes after takeoff, their pilot suffers a fatal heart attack, leaving them with no clue how to land the plane.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: S03E34 Young Man's Fancy Newlywed Alex Walker returns to his home and yearns for the days of his childhood.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: S03E35 I Sing the Body Electric A widower rents an android grandmother to take care of his three children.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: S03E36 Cavender Is Coming An angel (Jesse White) can earn his wings by helping a down-on-her-luck woman (Carol Burnett).

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: S05E01 In Praise of Pip Bookmaker Max Phillips learns that his son is dying in Vietnam and tries to save him. With Jack Klugman.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: S05E02 Steel Two small-time promoters find that their fighter can't meet his opponent in the ring. With Lee Marvin.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: S05E04 A Kind of Stopwatch Thomas Patrick McNulty is given a watch that possesses a strange power.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: S05E05 The Last Night of a Jockey A jockey's wish to become a giant in his profession has repercussions he may regret. With Mickey Rooney.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: S05E07 The Old Man in the Cave An old man in a cave offers guidance to survivors of a nuclear-war apocalypse, but their orderly world is shattered by the arrival of four soldiers.
