programme.title: NHL Hockey : Pittsburgh Penguins at Boston Bruins
programme.desc: Marco Sturm's Boston Bruins host Dan Muse and the Penguins at TD Garden. Pittsburgh seeks a sixth straight win, while Boston plays without defender Hampus Lindholm (IR). Sidney Crosby leads the Penguins with 24 goals and 47 points.

programme.title: NHL Hockey : New Jersey Devils at Winnipeg Jets
programme.desc: The Devils visit the Jets at Canada Life Centre. Winnipeg looks to end a 10-game losing streak behind left wing Kyle Connor, who has 20 goals and ranks among the league's top 10 in points. Both teams face each other for the first time this season.

programme.title: NHL Hockey : Seattle Kraken at New York Rangers ᴸᶦᵛᵉ
programme.desc: The Kraken clash against the Rangers for the second time this season, this time at Madison Square Garden. The Rangers defeated Seattle with a 3-2 overtime victory on Nov. 1. Artemi Panarin leads the Rangers with 48 points, 16 goals and 32 assists.

programme.title: NHL Hockey : Dallas Stars at Anaheim Ducks
programme.desc: The Dallas Stars face off against the Anaheim Ducks at the Honda Center for an interdivision matchup. Dallas (26-10-8) sits in second place in the Central Division. Anaheim (21-20-3) tries to find momentum and climb the Pacific Division standings.

programme.title: NHL Hockey : Detroit Red Wings at Boston Bruins
programme.desc: The Detroit Red Wings visit the Boston Bruins at TD Garden on for an Atlantic Division showdown. Red Wings legend Patrick Kane enters this game with massive momentum after scoring his 500th career goal on Jan. 8 against the Canucks.

programme.title: NFL Football : Green Bay Packers at Chicago Bears
programme.desc: Chicago (11-6) hosts Green Bay (9-7-1) for an NFC Wild Card playoff at Soldier Field. The Bears look to end a two-game skid behind QB Caleb Williams. Jordan Love, who has 23 TDs, leads the Packers as they aim to snap a four-game losing streak.

programme.title: NFL GameDay Morning ᴺᵉʷ
programme.desc: Rich Eisen is joined by Kurt Warner, Michael Irvin and Steve Mariucci to prep viewers for all of Sunday's action with expert analysis, stadium reports from around the league and their game picks.

programme.title: NFL Football : Los Angeles Rams at Carolina Panthers
programme.desc: The Los Angeles Rams visit the Carolina Panthers at Bank of America Stadium for an NFC Wild Card game. Bryce Young (23 TDs) looks to end a two-game skid, while Matthew Stafford (46 TDs) leads the offense. Both teams seek a critical playoff win.

programme.title: NFL GameDay Highlights ᴺᵉʷ
programme.desc: Breaking down all the highlights from Sunday's afternoon games.

programme.title: NFL Football : Green Bay Packers at Chicago Bears
programme.desc: Chicago (11-6) hosts Green Bay (9-7-1) for an NFC Wild Card playoff at Soldier Field. The Bears look to end a two-game skid behind QB Caleb Williams. Jordan Love, who has 23 TDs, leads the Packers as they aim to snap a four-game losing streak.

programme.title: NFL GameDay Highlights ᴺᵉʷ
programme.desc: Breaking down all the highlights from Sunday's afternoon games.

programme.title: NFL Football : Baltimore Ravens at Pittsburgh Steelers
programme.desc: The Ravens and Steelers clash at Acrisure Stadium with the AFC North title on the line. The winner claims the division crown, while the loser is eliminated. Baltimore quarterback Lamar Jackson returns to the lineup after a back contusion.

programme.title: NFL GameDay Final ᴺᵉʷ
programme.desc: Chris Rose and crew wrap up the day's NFL action with all the highlights and reactions, plus postgame interviews with the day's best performers.

programme.title: NFL Football : Buffalo Bills at Jacksonville Jaguars
programme.desc: The Buffalo Bills (12-5) visit the Jacksonville Jaguars (13-4) at EverBank Stadium. Quarterback Josh Allen (25 TDs) leads the 6th-seeded Bills against quarterback Trevor Lawrence (29 TDs) and a 3rd-seeded Jaguars team on an eight-game winning streak.

programme.title: NFL Football : San Francisco 49ers at Philadelphia Eagles
programme.desc: The San Francisco 49ers (12-5) visit the Philadelphia Eagles (11-6) at Lincoln Financial Field. Quarterback Brock Purdy (20 TDs) leads the 49ers against Saquon Barkley (1,140 yards) and the defending champion Eagles in a NFC Wild Card Playoff match.

programme.title: NFL GameDay Final
programme.desc: Chris Rose and crew wrap up the day's NFL action with all the highlights and reactions, plus postgame interviews with the day's best performers.

programme.title: NFL Football : Los Angeles Chargers at New England Patriots
programme.desc: The No. 2 seedcPatriots (14-3) host the No. 7 seed Chargers (11-6) at Gillette Stadium. MVP candidate Drake Maye (4,394 yards, 31 TDs) leads a revitalized Patriots squad under coach Mike Vrabel against Justin Herbert and Jim Harbaugh's.

programme.title: NFL Football : Houston Texans at Pittsburgh Steelers
programme.desc: The Texans (12-5) visit the Steelers (10-7) at Acrisure Stadium for an AFC Wild Card clash. C.J. Stroud (3,041 yards, 19 TDs) leads a red-hot Texans team against veteran Aaron Rodgers and the Steelers. Pittsburgh aims to protect home field.

programme.title: NFL Football : Los Angeles Rams at Carolina Panthers
programme.desc: The Los Angeles Rams visit the Carolina Panthers at Bank of America Stadium for an NFC Wild Card game. Bryce Young (23 TDs) looks to end a two-game skid, while Matthew Stafford (46 TDs) leads the offense. Both teams seek a critical playoff win.

programme.title: NFL Football : Green Bay Packers at Chicago Bears
programme.desc: Chicago (11-6) hosts Green Bay (9-7-1) for an NFC Wild Card playoff at Soldier Field. The Bears look to end a two-game skid behind QB Caleb Williams. Jordan Love, who has 23 TDs, leads the Packers as they aim to snap a four-game losing streak.

programme.title: BKFC FN Jackson 1
programme.desc: S1 E10 Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship Jackson, Miss. hosts its first Fight Night, featuring Elvin Leon Brito, Kaleb Harris, Alan Belcher, Quentin Henry & more.

programme.title: BKFC FN New York 2
programme.desc: S1 E11 Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship BKFC's second Fight Night in New York features Jarod Grant, Anthony Retic, Charisa Sigala, Zachary Calmus & more.

programme.title: BKFC 23
programme.desc: S1 E12 Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship Mike Richman & David Rickels headline BKFC 23. Also featuring Isaac Doolittle, Jared Warren, Jake Lindsey & more.

programme.title: BKFC 24
programme.desc: S1 E13 Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship Lorenzo Hunt & Joe Riggs headline BKFC 24. Featuring Rusty Crowder, Leo Pla, Kai Stewart & more.

programme.title: BKFC 25
programme.desc: S1 E14 Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship Arnold Adams & Dillon Cleckler headline BKFC 25. Also featuring David Mundell, Jay Jackson, Jack Claffey & more.

programme.title: Schumacher & Schumacher
programme.desc: Michael Schumacher was the undisputed Formula One world champion, breaking new records with each victory. Despite his profession, he enjoyed thrill-seeking outside of his career, pastime activities that would change Schumacher's fate.

programme.title: Lewis Hamilton: The Winning Formula
programme.desc: As the only black Formula One driver in history, Lewis' journey to becoming the most decorated Formula One driver in history, is one of dreams, courage, and determination. Lewis Hamilton has had to overcome adversity from the very beginning.

programme.title: Fubo Sports Network Presents
programme.desc: Some of the best moments of in sports talk on Fubo Sports Network.

programme.desc: S5 E33 We delve into the remarkable story of Henrik Larsson, tracing how a young talent from Sweden rose to become one of football's most celebrated forwards. Visiting the clubs, coaches and moments that shaped him, we uncover the milestones, inspirations and unforgettable goals that forged his legacy as a player.
